metadata.name: Create Presentation and Posts Workflow
metadata.shortDescription: Multi-format content creation workflow that transforms a topic into presentation plan, PowerPoint file, and blog posts
metadata.description: Orchestrates a complete content creation workflow that transforms a single topic into three deliverables: a structured presentation plan, a PowerPoint file, and blog posts. Executes a sequential process ensuring consistency across all content formats while adapting to different presentation types and audience needs.
objectives: Create structured presentation plan from topic and audience requirements
Generate PowerPoint presentation file using Python automation
Produce blog posts in brochure/conversational styles from presentation plan
Ensure consistent messaging across all content formats
Provide complete multi-format content packages for technical communications
metadata.author: OLAF Technical Writer
useCases: Product feature announcements requiring both presentation and blog content
Technical documentation with both slide and written formats
Educational content needing multiple delivery formats
Conference presentations with follow-up blog posts
